title: 'New Yorker' Cartoonist And TV Producer Writes 'Honest Portrait' Of His Parents
teaser: Bruce Eric Kaplan's illustrated memoir I Was A Child describes his life in Maplewood, N.J., in the '60s and '70s. He says it's a way of keeping his parents alive, "not just for me, but for the world."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
